content:
There are two open PhD positions in Tallinn as part of the Estonian Research Council funded ALICE project, starting in November 2021. These are fully funded with a generous stipend for the entire four year period. The deadline to apply is the end of this month, September 30 2021.

While the official supervisor teams are Hellis Tamm & Hendrik Maarand and Silvio Capobianco & Tarmo Uustalu respectively, the students will be integrated in my and Tarmo Uustalu's groups, and a strong mathematical background and interest in category theory are a bonus!

Please forward to any possible interested people, and feel free to contact me at sobocinski@gmail.com if you have questions.

More details here:
https://compose.ioc.ee/alice/
